auth.usernameMin: Username must be at least 3 characters
auth.passwordMin: Password must be at least 6 characters

LandingSection.title: Discover Fashion for
LandingSection.description2: Find your perfect look with our latest collections.

sections.paragraphDiscount: Grab top styles with exclusive price drops.
sections.paragraphNewArrivals: Discover the latest fashion trends just landed in store.

peace.subtitle: Comfortable Shopping
peace.description: Enjoy a smooth and secure shopping experience with easy returns, buyer protection, and 24/7 customer support.

security.subtitle: Shop with Confidence
security.description: Your data is always safe with us. We use secure payment gateways and never share your personal information.

luxury.subtitle: Premium Collections
luxury.description: Discover high-quality clothing with luxurious fabrics, modern cuts, and timeless designs made to impress.

price.subtitle: Unbeatable Deals
price.description: Find the best discounts on men’s, women’s, and kids’ fashion. Get trendy outfits without breaking the bank.

location.subtitle: Fast Delivery
location.description: Wherever you are, we deliver quickly and reliably. With warehouses in major cities, your orders reach you faster.

efficient.subtitle: Easy Browsing
efficient.description: Shop smarter with powerful filters, categories, and personalized recommendations to find the perfect outfit in minutes.

search.heading: Find the Perfect Style for You
search.paragraph: Discover a wide collection of men’s, women’s, and kids’ fashion at unbeatable prices. Use our smart filters to sort products by price, rating, views, or discounts, and explore categories that match your unique taste. Whether you’re looking for everyday essentials or the latest trends, we’ve got you covered.

cart.head: Your Cart
cart.signIn: You should sign in to view cart
cart.error: Failed to load cart. Please try again.

footer.about: Discover stylish clothing for Men, Women, and Kids. Your fashion journey starts here.
